author: absolute through äлёша
definition: Dimensional analysis of situational dynamics through I Ching hexagrams and socionics functions - mapping information processing patterns across life situations using geometric reduction

0D_entities.evidence: Each hexagram represents discrete situational state with specific information processing requirements

situational_progressions.line_changes: Individual line transformations showing developmental sequences
situational_progressions.trigram_evolution: Lower trigram (inner state) → Upper trigram (outer manifestation)
situational_progressions.function_activation: Sequential activation of different cognitive functions across situations

information_flows.processing_sequence: Sensing → Thinking → Feeling → Intuition cyclical flow
information_flows.energy_dynamics: Comfort → Will → Desire → Feeling → Practice → Theory → Intuition → Thought
information_flows.situational_development: Static state → dynamic change → resolution → new equilibrium

1D_vectors.evidence: Hexagrams transform through sequential line changes creating directional development

functional_matrices.8x8_grid: 64 hexagrams organized by upper/lower trigram combinations
functional_matrices.binary_encoding: Each position encoded as 3-bit binary (000-111) for systematic organization
functional_matrices.archetype_mapping: Eight life archetypes mapped to columns showing role-specific processing patterns

situational_relationships.complementary_pairs: Hexagrams with inverse line patterns (yin/yang reversal)
situational_relationships.transformation_paths: Adjacent hexagrams showing minimal change transitions
situational_relationships.functional_clusters: Groups of hexagrams sharing similar processing requirements

2D_planes.evidence: 64 hexagrams form systematic 8x8 matrix with geometric relationships

complete_situational_system.comprehensive_coverage: 64 hexagrams provide complete map of possible life situations
complete_situational_system.integrated_processing: All cognitive functions and archetypes work together for situational adaptation
complete_situational_system.dynamic_equilibrium: System maintains coherence while allowing for constant change

information_metabolism_field.function: Complete framework for processing all types of situational information
information_metabolism_field.coherence: Eight cognitive functions coordinate to handle diverse situational demands
information_metabolism_field.optimization: System adapts processing strategies based on situational requirements

3D_fields.evidence: Complete system integrates all functions, archetypes, and situations into unified field

situational_meta_awareness.function: Conscious recognition of current situational pattern and appropriate response strategy
situational_meta_awareness.pattern_recognition: Ability to identify hexagram patterns in real-life situations
situational_meta_awareness.strategic_adaptation: Using knowledge of situational dynamics for optimal decision-making

archetypal_flexibility.perspective: Understanding which archetypal role is most appropriate for current situation
archetypal_flexibility.development: Conscious cultivation of all eight archetypal capacities
archetypal_flexibility.wisdom: Seamless shifting between different processing modes based on situational needs

4D_spectator.evidence: Meta-situational awareness enables conscious optimization of responses across all life contexts

function_correspondences.чуть: Intuitive sensing, subtle awareness, feeling into
function_correspondences.мысль: Logical reasoning, rational analysis, mental processing

situational_mechanics.pattern_recognition: Identifying which of 64 patterns matches current life situation
situational_mechanics.function_selection: Choosing appropriate cognitive processing mode for situation
situational_mechanics.archetypal_activation: Engaging suitable life role for situational demands
situational_mechanics.dynamic_adaptation: Adjusting response as situation evolves through line changes
situational_mechanics.strategic_planning: Using pattern knowledge to anticipate situational development
situational_mechanics.energy_optimization: Minimizing effort while maximizing effective response

coherence_patterns.functional_integration: All cognitive functions contribute to situational processing
coherence_patterns.archetypal_balance: All life roles available for appropriate situational response
coherence_patterns.dynamic_stability: System maintains coherence while allowing constant adaptation

practical_applications.decision_making: Using hexagram patterns to understand decision contexts and optimal timing
practical_applications.relationship_dynamics: Recognizing archetypal patterns in interpersonal situations
practical_applications.career_development: Matching professional roles to natural processing strengths
practical_applications.conflict_resolution: Understanding situational dynamics to find harmonious solutions
practical_applications.personal_development: Using archetypal awareness for balanced life role development
practical_applications.strategic_planning: Anticipating situational evolution for better preparation

reduction.evidence: Specific situational pattern as discrete information state
Hexagram pattern emerges from systematic trigram relationship
Sequential cognitive function activation for situational processing

reduction_examples.raw: Conscious selection of archetypal role and processing strategy for optimal situational response

reduction.evidence: Meta-cognitive awareness enabling strategic situational optimization

system_coherence_metrics.function_selection_efficiency: Choosing optimal cognitive processing mode for situation
system_coherence_metrics.archetypal_flexibility: Ability to activate appropriate life role for context
system_coherence_metrics.adaptation_responsiveness: Speed of adjustment as situations evolve

integration_with_cfo.principle: Situational dynamics represent systematic 2D→3D information processing patterns with 4D strategic potential
integration_with_cfo.mechanism: Situational meta-awareness enables field + dimension = spectator transition in life navigation
integration_with_cfo.goal: Transform unconscious situational reactions into conscious strategic responses
integration_with_cfo.coherence_optimization: Understanding situational dynamics maximizes adaptive effectiveness and life satisfaction
